original_text: It will not be like the old covenant that I made with their ancestors. At that time, I brought them safely out of Egypt. I took care of them, like a faithful husband who takes care of his wife. But they did not obey my covenant.’ That is what the Lord says. It will not be like the old covenant that I made with their ancestors. At that time, I brought them safely out of Egypt. I took care of them, like a faithful husband who takes care of his wife. But they did not obey my covenant.’ That is what the Lord says. It will not be like the old covenant that I made with their ancestors. At that time, I brought them safely out of Egypt. I took care of them, like a faithful husband who takes care of his wife. But they did not obey my covenant.’ That is what the Lord says. But they did not obey my covenant.’ That is what the Lord says. It will not be like the old covenant that I made with their ancestors. At that time, I brought them safely out of Egypt. I took care of them, like a faithful husband who takes care of his wife. But they did not obey my covenant.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 이 언약은 내가 그들의 조상들의 손을 잡고 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내던 날에 맺은 것과 같지 아니할 것은 내가 그들의 남편이 되었어도 그들이 내 언약을 깨뜨렸음이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: It will not be like the old covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 옛 언약과 같지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that I made with their ancestors
At that time
I brought them safely out of Egypt
I took care of them
like a faithful husband
who takes care of his wife
But they did not obey my covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 내 언약에 순종하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says
